Committed to leveraging cutting-edge technology to enhance daily life, Dreame offers a range of smart home cleaning products, including robotic vacuums, robotic lawnmowers, wet and dry vacuums, cordless stick vacuums, and high-speed hair dryers. These products help millions of users save time and improve their quality of life.

Innovation lies at the heart of Dreame. Since 2015, its founding team has pioneered high-speed digital motors and intelligent algorithms, providing a unique technological edge. Dreame holds over 6,300 patents worldwide, underscoring its commitment to technology leadership.

By collaborating with top design institutes, Dreame combines advanced technology with user-friendly design to create products that seamlessly integrate into everyday life. Trusted by more than 30 million households across over 100 countries, Dreame operates over 6,000 physical stores and serves over 11 million customers worldwide.
